title: Xiaomi launches new premium TWS earbuds and two smartwatches alongside the Xiaomi 12 series
content:
At today’s Xiaomi 12 series global launch event, Xiaomi launched three new flagship smartphones — the Xiaomi 12, Xiaomi 12 Pro, and the Xiaomi 12X. In addition, the company launched two new smartwatches, the Xiaomi Watch S1 and Watch S1 Active, and pair of premium TWS earbuds dubbed Xiaomi Buds 3T Pro. We’ve already shared

The post Xiaomi launches new premium TWS earbuds and two smartwatches alongside the Xiaomi 12 series appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Xiaomi has launched the Xiaomi Watch S1, Watch S1 Active, and the Buds 3T Pro in international markets. Read on to learn more.
